review_text: I like this app. Although you still can't use it while syncing it completely freezes until that's done. This new update is fire! The lag used to be a real issue, it was extremely laggy. I've used keep on my laptop and now on my phone as well. Not to mention being unable to use the app when it's syncing because its literally stop responding until it's done. You'd stop an entry and wait several seconds, which made the app a pain. but now the download performance is smooth and more stable.

I love the app.! it was extremely laggy. The app is sooo much faster download! This is syncing happens pretty much every time you open the app, start, stop, or edit an entry, so it was a real pain to use. Not to mention being unable to use the app when it's syncing because its literally stop responding until it's done. You'd stop an entry and it'd be several seconds before it'd actually stop and those extra seconds are added to the entry. but now the soo much faster download and more stable.thnx

I love the app! This new update is seriously fire. It‚Äôs soo much faster and smoother now, especially during downloads and syncing. Before, it used to be extremely laggy and would freeze completely whenever syncing started. You‚Äôd stop an entry, and it‚Äôd take several seconds before it actually stopped, which was annoying.
